name: kicky
content:
kicky adjective
(FASHIONABLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
fashionable and stylish: He wore knee-high boots and a kicky black trench coat. Check out these key trends now to find your kickiest look.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has added blonde extensions to her brown hair for a kickier look.

kicky adjective
(EXCITING)
exciting and interesting: After this kicky beginning, the play stagnates. The performers imbued the show with a kicky energy and attitude.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's not as trendy and kicky as some of the other new introductions, but I love it.

kicky adjective
(STRONG TASTE)
with a strong or spicy taste: Every good onion ring needs a spicy, kicky dipping sauce to go along with it. mussels in a kicky pepper sauce
